product_name: GoPro Standard Housing BacPac Backdoor Kit
long_description: The GoPro Standard Housing BacPac Backdoor kit enables the Standard Housing to fit a GoPro camera with an attached LCD Touch BacPac or Battery BacPac (sold separately). Includes Standard, Skeleton and Touch BacPac Backdoors. Compatible with GoPro Standard Housings.
short_description: The GoPro Standard Housing BacPac Backdoor kit enables the Standard Housing to fit a GoPro camera with an attached LCD Touch BacPac or Battery BacPac (sold separately).
